#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

int64_t ShardKvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int ShardKvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    cout<<"***PUT---OID IS---"<<to_string(oid)<<" key  is "<<k<<" value is "<<v<<endl;
  operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] = KV_TIMEOUT;
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &term);
  if(!isLeader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  //cout<<"***PUT---OID IS---"<<to_string(oid)<<" key  is "<<k<<" value is "<<v<<endl;
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);


  uint64_t index = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallableObject = s;
  this->GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableObject, &index ,&term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(900000);
  // if (keyToValueMapping.find(k) == keyToValueMapping.end() || keyToValueMapping[k].compare(v) != 0) {
  //   cout<<"Key not found in map for PUT FUNCTION"<<endl;
  //   return KV_SUCCESS;
  // } else {
  //   cout<<"Key found in map for PUT FUNCTION"<<endl;
  //   return KV_SUCCESS;
  // }
  
  if (operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] == KV_TIMEOUT) {
    cout<<"***PUT---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" gave timeout"<<endl;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  cout<<"***PUT---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" was successful"<<endl;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] = KV_TIMEOUT;
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &term);
  if(!isLeader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);


  uint64_t index = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallableObject = s;
  this->GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableObject, &index ,&term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(1600000);
  if (operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] == KV_TIMEOUT) {
    cout<<"***APPEND---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" gave timeout"<<endl;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  //cout<<"***APPEND---Operation "<<to_string(oid)<<" was successful"<<endl;
  return KV_SUCCESS;
}

int ShardKvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code

  operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] = KV_TIMEOUT;
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t term = 0;
  this->GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &term);
  if(!isLeader) {
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back("0");


  uint64_t index = 0;
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> marshallableObject = s;
  this->GetRaftServer().Start(marshallableObject, &index ,&term);
  Coroutine::Sleep(500000);
  if (operationToStatusMapping[to_string(oid)] != KV_TIMEOUT) {
    cout<<"GET SUCCESSS FOR - "<<to_string(oid)<<endl;
    //cout<<" ANS IS "<<keyToValueMapping[k]<<endl;
    *v = keyToValueMapping[k];
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  } else {
    cout<<"GET TIMEOUTT FOR - "<<to_string(oid)<<endl;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
}

void ShardKvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
    // lab_shard: fill in your code
    auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string oid = v->data_.at(0);
  string operation = v->data_.at(1);
  string key = v->data_.at(2);
  string val = v->data_.at(3);
  operationToStatusMapping[oid] = KV_SUCCESS;
  //cout<<" VAL FOR REELECTION KEY IS "<<keyToValueMapping["reelection"]<<endl;
  //cout<<"---OPID--"<<oid<<"--operation--"<<operation<<"---KEY---"<<key<<"---value---"<<val<<endl;
  if (operation.compare("put") == 0) {
    keyToValueMapping[key] = val;
  } else if (operation.compare("append") == 0) {
    if (keyToValueMapping.find(key) == keyToValueMapping.end()) {
      keyToValueMapping[key] = val;
    } else {
      keyToValueMapping[key] += val;
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<ShardKvClient> ShardKvServer::CreateClient(Communicator* comm) {
  auto cli = make_shared<ShardKvClient>();
  cli->commo_ = comm;
  verify(cli->commo_ != nullptr);
  static uint32_t id = 0;
  id++;
  cli->cli_id_ = id; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
